mapper.select: select s.name as student_name, s.profile_content as student_profile from User s right outer join (select q.question_number, q.user_number, q.teach_user_number, q.problem_number, q.question_title, q.question_content, q.question_answered, q.question_check, q.created_at, q.question_reply, p.problem_title, u.name, u.profile_content from Question q left outer join Problem p on q.problem_number = p.problem_number left outer join User u) on u.user_number = q.teach_user_number order by question_answered asc, created_at desc

select q.question_number, q.user_number, q.teach_user_number, q.problem_number, q.question_title, q.question_content, q.question_answered, q.question_check, q.created_at, q.question_reply, p.problem_title, u.name, u.profile_content, u.name as student_name, u.profile_content as student_profile from Question q left outer join Problem p on q.problem_number = p.problem_number left outer join User u on u.user_number = q.teach_user_number where q.user_number = #{user_number} order by created_at desc
mapper.insert: insert into Question (user_number, problem_number, question_title, question_content) values(#{user_number},#{problem_number}, #{question_title}, #{question_content})
